400.title: 400: Bad Request
400.message: The request could not be processed due to a syntax error.

401.title: 401: Unauthorized
401.message: Authorization is required to access the requested resource.

403.title: 403: Forbidden
403.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

404.title: 404: Not Found
404.message:
The requested resource could not be found. This may be caused by:
- An incorrect URL
- A non-existent endpoint on the server

405.title: 405: Method Not Allowed
405.message: The method used in the request is not allowed for this resource.

408.title: 408: Request Timeout
408.message: The server timed out waiting for the request.

429.title: 429: Too Many Requests
429.message: You have sent too many requests in a given amount of time. Please wait and try again.

500.title: 500: Internal Server Error
500.message: The server encountered an unexpected error. It's not your fault.

502.title: 502: Bad Gateway
502.message: The server received an invalid response from an upstream server.

503.title: 503: Service Unavailable
503.message: The server is currently unavailable due to maintenance or overload.

networkError.title: Error while making an HTTP request.
networkError.possibleCauses:
- No internet connection
- Server is unavailable or returned an error
- CORS error â€” resource access blocked by browser policy
- Invalid URL or request parameters
- Response is not valid JSON
- Third-party software (e.g., VPN, proxy, antivirus) interfering with the request
networkError.suggestions:
- Check the URL and request parameters
- Ensure the server is running and accessible
- Verify CORS headers and server settings
- Validate the JSON response
- Try manually repeating the request using curl/Postman
